title: TravelizeBD
description: TravelizeBD is a tourism package management system designed to simplify booking and managing tours across Bangladesh. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, it provides a seamless experience for tourists, admins, and tour guides. Users can explore tour packages, book trips, and access dashboards, while admins and guides manage tours efficiently.
key_features: ✅ Tourist Dashboard – Browse and book tours. ✅ Admin Panel – Manage packages and bookings. ✅ Tour Guide Interface – Track tours and clients. ✅ Secure Authentication – Role-based login. ✅ Real-Time Updates – Seamless user communication.

title: PatHaven
description: Pet Haven is a comprehensive platform for pet care services, offering a seamless experience for users to register, book, and manage pet services. With secure authentication and intuitive service management, Pet Haven ensures a hassle-free experience for pet owners.
key_features: ✅ User Authentication – Secure login and registration. ✅ Comprehensive Home Page – Engaging banner, services, and quick navigation. ✅ Private Routes – Access 'My Schedule,' 'Add Service,' and 'Manage Service.' ✅ Service Management – Add, customize, and control pet services. ✅ Seamless Booking – Quick and easy service booking.
